adviseScripts.text: I feel like going somewhere high up.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: How about the upper part of the Command Center?
Do you want me to carry you on my back?
Just... can I lie on your lap instead?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: but it might be tiring for you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Just let me lie on your lap,
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: I let Nero lie on my lap.
Can we talk while lying down today?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Nero curls up on the couch in the Commander's Room.
Nero approaches me and rubs her head against my arm.
I don't want pats. Do you have any food?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: I actually feel like snacking right now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: It'd be purrfect if you could give me some.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: I give Nero some cat treats.
Do you also want to understand cats?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: I can already communicate with you though.
I don't mind if I don't understand them. They're cute anyway.
Meow meow. Meow meow meow meow. Meow.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Do you really find me cute when you look at me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Then look to your heart's content.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: I can make you feel better.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Nero teaches me the language of cats.
Which one do you like better: cats or dogs?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Of course, cats are the best choice.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Is that a well-considered answer, meow?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Do you really like dogs over cats?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Nero takes out a can of tuna.
Shall I open it for you?
You're so considerate, I love it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: I've been waiting for you to return
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: so I could ask you to open it for me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Nero slaps the floor with her tail.
This isn't for you. I want you to open it for me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: I've been waiting for you to come back
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: because I trust you to lend me a helping paw.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: I help Nero open the canned tuna.
Scoops, things have been tough lately.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Because Biscuit keeps asking you to play with her?
What could be causing someone like you to struggle?
Every creature has its own struggles.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Biscuit has been asking me to play with her a lot lately.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: She never seems to get tired, and if I agree to play with her, I have to do it all day.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: I lay a blanket out on the couch so Nero can rest.
Nero cleans her face with her hands.
You wash your face just like a cat.
As a Nikke, you can't just clean yourself like that and call it a day.
That's because I am a cat.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: I set out to search for Nero, who has left.
It's time for our counseling session, but Nero hasn't shown up yet.
Quietly swing the cat teaser in the air.
A sound comes from the window.
A sound comes from the window.
Aren't you going to swing the toy anymore?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: I guess I'll have to schedule the session with her for another time.
Could it be the milk I drank?
Huh? I don't know what smell you're talking about.
This sweet scent is definitely from delicious milk.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: I want some too. Some sweet, sweet milk.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Nero and I go buy some milk together.
Scoops, what kind of weather do you like?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Too much water falling, and no sun. It gets so cold.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: My fur becomes fluffy, and my paws feel warm.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Nero and I hope for a bright and sunny day tomorrow.
It feels so cozy and comfortable hanging out with Admi.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Purr... I just feel that she smells like me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: I don't know about Admi, but I'm not a child.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: I was trying to say that we both smell like cats.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Purr... That may be the case.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Admi also smells like a cat.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: I'm not sure if it's because she likes cats or because she resembles one...
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Either way, I feel pawsitive and comfortable whenever I see her.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Nero and I talk about Admi while thinking of her.
Biscuit gets really scared when she sees Leona
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: even when Leona didn't do anything.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Maybe her existence itself is intimidating?
Maybe Biscuit is just too timid?
Leona is just bigger in size, but she's not scary.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: No matter how I think of it, I believe it's because Biscuit is simply a scaredy-dog.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Leona is just bigger in size, but she's not scary.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: That's just how small animals are.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Why don't you help them get closer?
I talk to Nero about how to get along well with friends.
Biscuit has been so annoying lately...
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Should I tell her to stay away from you?
But wouldn't it be a shame if she's not around?
I need her to pass me treats when I'm feeling lazy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: When I'm hot, I need her to fan me...
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: And when I'm cold, I need her to tuck me in.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: She's a bother sometimes, but when she's not here, I miss her.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: When I'm hot, I need her to fan me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: And when I'm cold, I need her to tuck me in.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: No need to state the obvious.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Mary and Pepper said that they'll come looking for me if I don't get a check-up within this week.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Where do you think would be a good place to hide?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: I'll be with you. Let's go to the hospital.
Then I'll hide under the bed.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: ... No, scratch that. I should stay in the closet.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: No way, I'm not going to the hospital. It's too scary.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: I'll find somewhere to hide on my own.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: I comfort Nero, who is clearly frightened.
It's time for counseling, but Nero hasn't shown up yet.
No cat toys are in sight either.
Open an empty box and place it on the floor.
Make sounds with an empty plastic bag.
There's a rustling sound from the bed.
Nero rolls out from under the bed.
Being in this box makes me sleepy...
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: There's a rustling sound from the bed.
Nero rolls out from under the bed.
Nero dashes out of the door!
I guess I'll have to reschedule Nero's session for another time.
What will you do when you feel lonely?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: My hands will get sweaty if we hold hands for too long.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: If that's what you want, I won't mind.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: So... Make sure to visit me when you're lonely.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: My tail is off-limits, even for you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: I talk to Nero about ways to relieve loneliness.
Nero stares out the window in a daze.
After a while, Nero turns her attention to her surroundings.
I was staring out of the window, and I didn't notice you were here.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Just gazing out of the window makes me feel content.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Would you like to join me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: I take a brief break, gazing out of the window with Nero.
Meow... I don't want more clothes...
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Blankets are the best when it's cold outside.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: It'll be warmer if we cuddle together...
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: I snuggle under the blanket with Nero to stay warm.
Scoops, do you know any place that will brighten up the day?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: The supermarket where I can find everything I need.
Hmm, that answer feels a bit too deliberate...
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: But it does make me happy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: That's not the answer I expected.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: But they have cat toys and treats there. Isn't that great?
... It seems like the supermarket could be a pawesome place.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nero

adviseScripts.text: Nero and I decide to go to a place that makes us both happy.
